initial:
A box component (container for Konekti components) is connected to a html component using method:
Konekti.box(id, cl, sty', plugin, ... )
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the box container
clClass configuration of the box container
styStyle configuration of the box container
pluginKonekti component to be inside the box container
...Specificic arguments of the Konekti component (same order, without id)
